columns.name: id
columns.description: The ID of the finding.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The ARN that specifies the finding.

columns.name: agent_id
columns.description: The ID of the agent that is installed on the EC2 instance where the finding is generated.

columns.name: asset_type
columns.description: The type of the host from which the finding is generated.

columns.name: auto_scaling_group
columns.description: The Auto Scaling group of the EC2 instance where the finding is generated.

columns.name: confidence
columns.description: This data element is currently not used.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: The time when the finding was generated.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.description: The time when AddAttributesToFindings is called.

columns.name: description
columns.description: The description of the finding.

columns.name: indicator_of_compromise
columns.description: This data element is currently not used.

columns.name: numeric_severity
columns.description: The numeric value of the finding severity.

columns.name: recommendation
columns.description: The recommendation for the finding.

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: The schema version of this data type.

columns.name: service
columns.description: The data element is set to 'Inspector'.

columns.name: severity
columns.description: The finding severity. Values can be set to High, Medium, Low, and Informational.

columns.name: asset_attributes
columns.description: A collection of attributes of the host from which the finding is generated.

columns.name: attributes
columns.description: The system-defined attributes for the finding.

columns.name: failed_items
columns.description: Attributes details that cannot be described. An error code is provided for each failed item.

columns.name: service_attributes
columns.description: This data type is used in the Finding data type.

columns.name: user_attributes
columns.description: The user-defined attributes that are assigned to the finding.

columns.name: title
columns.description: The name of the finding.
